Package uk.ac.ed.inf

Class ResultsWriter

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.ed.inf.ResultsWriter
public class ResultsWriter extends Object
The class to write the result produced by drone into files: flightpath-YYYY-MM-DD.json, deliveries-YYYY-MM-DD.json and drone-YYYY-MM-DD.geojson.

    • writeDroneGeojson

      public void writeDroneGeojson(List<com.mapbox.geojson.Feature> landmarks, List<Flightpath> allFlightpath)
      Create the geojson file to render the flight path of drone on GeoJson map
      Parameters:
      allFlightpath - all flightpath of the day
      landmarks - all landmarks retrieved from all.geojson, such as blue and yellow markers(restaurants and appleton tower), semi-transparent red polygons(no-fly zones), outer grey rectangle(central area)
